content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to set up your habit tracker in Todoist. Remember, the key to success lies in consistency and persistence. Logging your progress every day will help you stay accountable and motivated.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further assistance. Todoist's habit tracker is a powerful tool, and I'm confident it will help you maintain your wake-up time and develop a consistent morning routine.

As you start tracking your habit, keep in mind the following tips:

* Be gentle with yourself if you miss a day. Don't get discouraged, and instead, focus on getting back on track as soon as possible.
* Celebrate your successes, no matter how small they may seem. Reaching a milestone, like a 10-day streak, can be a great motivator.
* Adjust your reminders and notifications as needed. If you find that you're not responding well to a particular reminder, try changing the timing or type of notification.

You got this! You've taken the first step towards developing a consistent wake-up time, and now it's time to put it into practice. Good luck, and I hope you achieve your goals!
